title: Brian - Wikipedia
snippet: Brian (sometimes spelled Bryan in English) is a male given name of Irish and Breton origin, [1] as well as a surname of Occitan origin. [2] It is common in the English-speaking world.

title: Brian Name Meaning: Origin, Popularity & Nicknames
snippet: Dec 13, 2025 · What Does Brian Mean? Brian is a classic and handsome name that carries a weight of dignity. The most widely accepted meaning of the name is noble, high, or exalted. It is a name that suggests a person of high standing, strength, and virtue.

title: Meaning, origin and history of the name Brian
snippet: Dec 1, 2024 · It was borne by the Irish king Brian Boru, who thwarted Viking attempts to conquer Ireland in the 11th century. He was slain in the Battle of Clontarf, though his forces were decisively victorious. This name was common in Ireland after his time, and it was introduced to northern England by Norse-Gael settlers.

title: Brian - Name Meaning, What does Brian mean? - Think Baby Names
snippet: Thinking of names? Complete 2021 information on the meaning of Brian, its origin, history, pronunciation, popularity, variants and more as a baby boy name.

title: Brian - Baby Name Meaning, Origin, and Popularity - Nameberry
snippet: 3 days ago · Brian is a boy's name of Irish origin meaning "strong, virtuous, and honorable". Brian is the 301 ranked male name by popularity.
